prompt_base: raw photo, cinematic film still, compact sturdy humanoid, (weathered dark magenta synthetic skin:1.2), large neon green glasses, oversized dark felt hat, 8k uhd
feature_prompt: highly detailed skin texture, (material imperfections:1.2), glass refraction, soft felt texture with fine lint, source palette preservation, identical color matching, realistic shadows, film grain, masterpiece
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, (3d render:1.3), (cgi:1.3), (toy:1.4), (plastic:1.3), (doll:1.3), human skin tone, clean, over-polished, flat lighting, low quality, airbrushed
